p: After 14-DPE, female mosquitoes were removed from cages and immobilized by chilling on ice. Saliva was extracted by inserting the proboscis into a capillary tube filled with a 1:1 mixture of 10% sucrose and fetal bovine serum (FBS) [ 46]. The mosquitoes were given 30 min to feed and salivate. The saliva, legs and wings and body were placed into separate microcentrifuge tubes with DMEM and stored at − 80 °C until virus testing.
